name: Tri Focus
description: Fully-charged Inferno Staff Heavy Attacks deal 12% additional damage.  Lightning Staff Heavy Attacks damage nearby enemies for 100% of the damage done.  Fully-charged Ice Staff Heavy Attacks grants you a damage shield that absorbs 4000 damage.   While an Ice Staff is equipped, blocking costs Magicka instead of Stamina.
coefDescription: With Destruction Staff Equipped Fully-charged Inferno Staff Heavy Attacks deal 12% additional damage.  Lightning Staff Heavy Attacks damage nearby enemies for 100% of the damage done.  Fully-charged Ice Staff Heavy Attacks grants you a damage shield that absorbs $1 damage.   While an Ice Staff is equipped, blocking costs Magicka instead of Stamina.
rawDescription:
Fully-charged Inferno Staff Heavy Attacks deal <<1>> additional damage.

Lightning Staff Heavy Attacks damage nearby enemies for <<2>> of the damage done.

Fully-charged Ice Staff Heavy Attacks grants you a damage shield that absorbs <<3>> damage. 

While an Ice Staff is equipped, blocking costs Magicka instead of Stamina.
